Question: Under new head coach Jim Caldwell, this person started the 2009 season with a victory by throwing for 301 yards.
Hints: In the game, this person completed 19 of 26 passes for 253 yards, 2 touchdowns, and no interceptions.
In the Wild Card game against Denver, this person passed for 458 yards and 4 touchdowns.
This person won AFC Offensive Player of the Week for the 2nd time this season (18th time, career).
